TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed GeneratorSupport extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Defines identifiers used to determine whether a code generator supports certain types of code elements.

remarks.format:
## Remarks These identifiers are used when calling the <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.ICodeGenerator.Supports%2A> method of a code generator to determine whether the code generator supports generating certain types of code.
## Examples The following example illustrates using <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerParameters> to specify various compiler settings and options.
[!code-cpp[CompilerParametersExample#2](~/add/codesnippet/CPP/t-system.codedom.compile_8_1.cpp)] [!code-cs[CompilerParametersExample#2](~/add/codesnippet/CSharp/t-system.codedom.compile_8_1.cs)] [!code-vb[CompilerParametersExample#2](~/add/codesnippet/VisualBasic/t-system.codedom.compile_8_1.vb)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.CodeDom.Compiler.GeneratorSupport ArraysOfArrays = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Indicates the generator supports arrays of arrays.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.CodeDom.Compiler.GeneratorSupport AssemblyAttributes = int32(4096)

Docs.summary: Indicates the generator supports assembly attributes.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.CodeDom.Compiler.GeneratorSupport ChainedConstructorArguments = int32(32768)

Docs.summary: Indicates the generator supports chained constructor arguments.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.CodeDom.Compiler.GeneratorSupport ComplexExpressions = int32(524288)

Docs.summary: Indicates the generator supports complex expressions.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.CodeDom.Compiler.GeneratorSupport DeclareDelegates = int32(512)

Docs.summary: Indicates the generator supports delegate declarations.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.CodeDom.Compiler.GeneratorSupport DeclareEnums = int32(256)

Docs.summary: Indicates the generator supports enumeration declarations.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.CodeDom.Compiler.GeneratorSupport DeclareEvents = int32(2048)

Docs.summary: Indicates the generator supports event declarations.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.CodeDom.Compiler.GeneratorSupport DeclareIndexerProperties = int32(33554432)

Docs.summary: Indicates the generator supports the declaration of indexer properties.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.CodeDom.Compiler.GeneratorSupport DeclareInterfaces = int32(1024)

Docs.summary: Indicates the generator supports interface declarations.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.CodeDom.Compiler.GeneratorSupport DeclareValueTypes = int32(128)

Docs.summary: Indicates the generator supports value type declarations.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.CodeDom.Compiler.GeneratorSupport EntryPointMethod = int32(2)

Docs.summary: Indicates the generator supports a program entry point method designation. This is used when building executables.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.CodeDom.Compiler.GeneratorSupport GenericTypeDeclaration = int32(16777216)

Docs.summary: Indicates the generator supports generic type declarations.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.CodeDom.Compiler.GeneratorSupport GenericTypeReference = int32(8388608)

Docs.summary: Indicates the generator supports generic type references.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.CodeDom.Compiler.GeneratorSupport GotoStatements = int32(4)

Docs.summary: Indicates the generator supports goto statements.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.CodeDom.Compiler.GeneratorSupport MultidimensionalArrays = int32(8)

Docs.summary: Indicates the generator supports referencing multidimensional arrays. Currently, the CodeDom cannot be used to instantiate multidimensional arrays.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.CodeDom.Compiler.GeneratorSupport MultipleInterfaceMembers = int32(131072)

Docs.summary: Indicates the generator supports the declaration of members that implement multiple interfaces.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.CodeDom.Compiler.GeneratorSupport NestedTypes = int32(65536)

Docs.summary: Indicates the generator supports the declaration of nested types.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.CodeDom.Compiler.GeneratorSupport ParameterAttributes = int32(8192)

Docs.summary: Indicates the generator supports parameter attributes.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.CodeDom.Compiler.GeneratorSupport PartialTypes = int32(4194304)

Docs.summary: Indicates the generator supports partial type declarations.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.CodeDom.Compiler.GeneratorSupport PublicStaticMembers = int32(262144)

Docs.summary: Indicates the generator supports public static members.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.CodeDom.Compiler.GeneratorSupport ReferenceParameters = int32(16384)

Docs.summary: Indicates the generator supports reference and out parameters.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.CodeDom.Compiler.GeneratorSupport Resources = int32(2097152)

Docs.summary: Indicates the generator supports compilation with .NET Framework resources. These can be default resources compiled directly into an assembly, or resources referenced in a satellite assembly.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.CodeDom.Compiler.GeneratorSupport ReturnTypeAttributes = int32(64)

Docs.summary: Indicates the generator supports return type attribute declarations.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.CodeDom.Compiler.GeneratorSupport StaticConstructors = int32(16)

Docs.summary: Indicates the generator supports static constructors.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.CodeDom.Compiler.GeneratorSupport TryCatchStatements = int32(32)

Docs.summary: Indicates the generator supports statements.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.CodeDom.Compiler.GeneratorSupport Win32Resources = int32(1048576)

Docs.summary: Indicates the generator supports compilation with Win32 resources.
